Pre-Game Insights: The Houston Astros host the Oakland Athletics to begin a three-game series.
The Astros lead the season series 7-3.
Yordan Alvarez has 31 doubles, two triples and 32 home runs for the Astros.
Mauricio Dubon is 13-for-28 over the last 10 games.
Brent Rooker leads Oakland with 35 home runs while slugging.583.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The teams meet Tuesday for the 11th time this season.
Houston is 41-30 at home and 77-66 overall.
Oakland has a 62-82 record overall and a 26-43 record in road games.
The Astros have the eighth-best team on-base percentage in MLB play at.321.
The Athletics have a 32-58 record in games when they have allowed a home run.
Others: PITCHING PROBABLES: Athletics: Osvaldo Bido (5-3, 3.41 ERA, 1.09 WHIP, 63 strikeouts); Astros: Spencer Arrighetti (7-12, 4.82 ERA, 1.43 WHIP, 151 strikeouts);
BETMGM SPORTSBOOK: LINE Astros -187, Athletics +156; over/under is 8 1/2 runs
